00013 /**********************************************************************
00014  * hookapi.c
00015  * @Author Heng Yin <hyin@ece.cmu.edu>
00016  * This file is responsible for registering and calling function hooks.
00017  * 
00018  */ 
00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <inttypes.h>
00022 #include <errno.h>
00023 #include <assert.h>
00024 #include <dlfcn.h>
00025 #include <string.h>
00026 #include <limits.h>

00032 
00033 typedef struct hookapi_record{
00034   uint32_t eip;
00035   int is_global;
00036   uint32_t esp; //for hooking function return
00037   uint32_t cr3; //for hooking function return
00038   hook_proc_t fnhook;
00039   void *opaque;
00040   uint32_t sizeof_opaque;
00041   LIST_ENTRY(hookapi_record) link;
00042 } hookapi_record_t;
00043 
00044 typedef struct hookapi_handle{
00045   uintptr_t handle;
00046   LIST_ENTRY(hookapi_handle) link;
00047 } hookapi_handle_t;
00048 
00049 
00050 #define HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE 256
00051 LIST_HEAD(hookapi_record_list_head, hookapi_record) 
00052   hookapi_record_heads[HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE];
00053 
00054 LIST_HEAD(hookapi_handle_list_head, hookapi_handle) hookapi_handle_head = 
00055   LIST_HEAD_INITIALIZER(&hookapi_handle_head);
00056 
00057 static inline void hookapi_insert(hookapi_record_t *record)
00058 {
00059   struct hookapi_record_list_head *head =
00060       &hookapi_record_heads[record->eip & (HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE - 1)];
00061   
00062   LIST_INSERT_HEAD(head, record, link); 
00063   
00064   hookapi_handle_t *handle_info = malloc(sizeof(hookapi_handle_t));
00065   if(handle_info) {
00066     handle_info->handle = (uintptr_t)record;
00067     LIST_INSERT_HEAD(&hookapi_handle_head, handle_info, link);
00068   }
00069 }
00070 
00071 static void hookapi_remove_all()
00072 {
00073   hookapi_record_t *hrec;
00074   int i;
00075 
00076   for(i = 0; i<HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE; i++) {
00077     struct hookapi_record_list_head * head = &hookapi_record_heads[i];
00078   while(!LIST_EMPTY(head)) {
00079     hrec = LIST_FIRST(head);
00080     LIST_REMOVE(hrec, link);
00081     if(hrec->opaque != 0 && (uintptr_t)(hrec->opaque) != 1) 
00082         free(hrec->opaque);
00083     free(hrec);
00084   }
00085   }
00086   
00087   hookapi_handle_t *handle_info;
00088   while(!LIST_EMPTY(&hookapi_handle_head)) {
00089     handle_info = LIST_FIRST(&hookapi_handle_head);
00090     LIST_REMOVE(handle_info, link);
00091     free(handle_info);
00092   }    
00093 }
00094 
00095 static void hookapi_save(QEMUFile *f, void *opaque)
00096 {
00097   hookapi_record_t *hrec;
00098   int i;
00099   Dl_info info;
00100   uint32_t len;
00101   
00102   for(i = 0; i < HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE; i++) {
00103     LIST_FOREACH(hrec, &hookapi_record_heads[i], link) {
00104       qemu_put_be32(f, hrec->eip);
00105       
00106       if(dladdr((void *)hrec->fnhook, &info) == 0) {
00107         fprintf(stderr, "%s\n", dlerror());
00108         return;
00109       }
00110       len = strlen(info.dli_fname) + 1;
00111       qemu_put_be32(f, len);
00112       qemu_put_buffer(f, (uint8_t*)info.dli_fname, len); //module name
00113       qemu_put_be32(f, (uint32_t)((uintptr_t)hrec->fnhook - (uintptr_t)info.dli_fbase)); //relative address
00114       qemu_put_be32(f, (uint32_t)hrec->is_global);
00115       qemu_put_be32(f, hrec->esp);
00116       qemu_put_be32(f, hrec->cr3);
00117       qemu_put_be32(f, (uint32_t)(uintptr_t)hrec->opaque); //hacky!!!
00118       qemu_put_be32(f, hrec->sizeof_opaque);
00119       if(hrec->sizeof_opaque)
00120         qemu_put_buffer(f, (uint8_t *)hrec->opaque, hrec->sizeof_opaque);
00121       qemu_put_byte(f, 0xff); //separator
00122     }
00123   }
00124   qemu_put_be32(f, 0); //terminator
00125 }
00126 
00127 static int hookapi_load(QEMUFile *f, void *opaque, int version_id)
00128 {
00129   hookapi_remove_all();
00130   
00131   uint32_t eip, len;
00132   uintptr_t base = 0, relative_addr;
00133   hookapi_record_t *record;
00134   
00135   char mod_name[PATH_MAX];
00136   void *handle;
00137   
00138   while((eip = qemu_get_be32(f))) {
00139     len = qemu_get_be32(f);
00140     if(len < 1 || len > PATH_MAX) return -EINVAL;
00141     
00142     qemu_get_buffer(f, (uint8_t *)mod_name, len);
00143     handle = dlopen(mod_name, RTLD_NOLOAD);
00144     if(NULL == handle) {
00145       fprintf(stderr, "%s is not loaded \n", mod_name);
00146       dlclose(handle);
00147       return -EINVAL;
00148     }
00149     void *sym;
00150     if ((sym = dlsym(handle, "_init"))) {
00151       Dl_info dli;
00152       if (dladdr(sym, &dli)) 
00153         base = (uintptr_t) dli.dli_fbase;
00154     } else {
00155       fprintf(stderr, "cannot find base address of %s\n", mod_name);
00156       dlclose(handle);
00157       return -EINVAL;
00158     }
00159    
00160   relative_addr = qemu_get_be32(f);
00161 
00162     record = malloc(sizeof(hookapi_record_t));
00163     if(record == NULL) {
00164       fprintf(stderr, "out of memory!\n");
00165       dlclose(handle);
00166       return -EINVAL;
00167     }    
00168 
00169     record->fnhook = (hook_proc_t)(relative_addr + base);
00170     record->is_global = (int)qemu_get_be32(f);
00171     record->esp = qemu_get_be32(f);
00172     record->cr3 = qemu_get_be32(f);
00173     record->opaque = (void *)(uintptr_t)qemu_get_be32(f);
00174     record->sizeof_opaque = qemu_get_be32(f);
00175     if(record->sizeof_opaque) {
00176       if(NULL == (record->opaque = malloc(record->sizeof_opaque))) {
00177         fprintf(stderr, "out of memory: size=%d\n", record->sizeof_opaque);
00178         dlclose(handle);
00179         free(record);
00180         return -EINVAL;
00181       }
00182       qemu_get_buffer(f, (uint8_t *)record->opaque, record->sizeof_opaque);
00183     }      
00184     uint8_t separator = qemu_get_byte(f);
00185     if(separator != 0xff) {
00186       dlclose(handle);
00187       free(record);
00188       return -EINVAL; 
00189     } 
00190 
00191     hookapi_insert(record);
00192     dlclose(handle);
00193   }
00194 
00195   return 0;
00196 }
00197 
00198 void init_hookapi()
00199 {
00200   int i;
00201   for (i = 0; i < HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE; i++)
00202     LIST_INIT(&hookapi_record_heads[i]);
00203   register_savevm("hookapi", 0, 2, hookapi_save, hookapi_load, NULL);
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 void hookapi_cleanup()
00208 {
00209   hookapi_remove_all();  
00210   deregister_savevm("hookapi", 0);
00211 }

00213 #if 0
00214 int register_hookapi(uint32_t eip, hook_proc_t fnhook, void *opaque, uint32_t sizeof_opaque)
00215 {
00216   struct list_head *pos, *head =
00217       &hookapi_htab[eip & (HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE - 1)];
00218   hookapi_record_t *hrec;
00219 
00220   list_for_each(pos, head) {
00221     hrec = list_entry(pos, hookapi_record_t, link);
00222     if (hrec->eip == eip) {
00223       hrec->fnhook = fnhook;
00224       hrec->opaque = opaque;
00225       hrec->sizeof_opaque = opaque? sizeof_opaque: 0;
00226       return 0;
00227     }
00228   }
00229 
00230   hrec = malloc(sizeof(hookapi_record_t));
00231   if (hrec == NULL)
00232     return -1;
00233 
00234   hrec->eip = eip;
00235   hrec->fnhook = fnhook;
00236   hrec->opaque = opaque;
00237   hrec->sizeof_opaque = opaque? sizeof_opaque: 0;
00238   list_add(&hrec->link, head);
00239   return 0;
00240 }
00241 #endif
00242 
00243 uintptr_t hookapi_hook_function(
00244                int is_global,
00245                uint32_t eip, 
00246                hook_proc_t fnhook, 
00247                void *opaque, 
00248                uint32_t sizeof_opaque
00249                )
00250 {
00251   hookapi_record_t *record = malloc(sizeof(hookapi_record_t));
00252   if (record == NULL)
00253     return 0;
00254 
00255   bzero(record, sizeof(hookapi_record_t));
00256   record->eip = eip;
00257   record->is_global = is_global;
00258   record->fnhook = fnhook;
00259   record->sizeof_opaque = sizeof_opaque;
00260   record->opaque = opaque;
00261   
00262   hookapi_insert(record);
00263   return (uintptr_t)record;
00264 }
00265 
00266 uintptr_t 
00267 hookapi_hook_return(
00268                uint32_t eip, 
00269                hook_proc_t fnhook, 
00270                void *opaque, 
00271                uint32_t sizeof_opaque
00272                )
00273 {
00274   hookapi_record_t *record = malloc(sizeof(hookapi_record_t));
00275   if (record == NULL)
00276     return 0;
00277 
00278   record->eip = eip;
00279   record->is_global = 0;
00280   record->esp = TEMU_cpu_regs[R_ESP];
00281   record->cr3 = TEMU_cpu_cr[3];
00282   record->fnhook = fnhook;
00283   record->sizeof_opaque = sizeof_opaque;
00284   record->opaque = opaque;
00285 
00286   hookapi_insert(record);
00287   return (uintptr_t)record;
00288 }
00289 
00290 
00291 void hookapi_remove_hook(uintptr_t handle)
00292 {
00293   //we need to sanitize this handle. 
00294   //check if this handle exists in our handle list
00295   hookapi_handle_t *handle_info;
00296 
00297   LIST_FOREACH(handle_info, &hookapi_handle_head, link) {
00298     if(handle_info->handle != handle)
00299       continue;
00300 
00301     //we found this handle
00302     LIST_REMOVE(handle_info, link);
00303     free(handle_info);    
00304     hookapi_record_t *record = (hookapi_record_t *)handle;
00305     LIST_REMOVE(record, link);
00306     //here, we do not free record->opaque, because caller should free it
00307     free(record);
00308     return;
00309   }
00310   assert(0); //this handle is invalid
00311 }

00313 #if 0
00314 int remove_hookapi(uint32_t eip)
00315 {
00316   struct list_head *pos, *head =
00317       &hookapi_htab[eip & (HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE - 1)];
00318   hookapi_record_t *hrec;
00319 
00320   /* here we don't free opaque. caller should take care of it*/
00321   list_for_each(pos, head) {
00322     hrec = list_entry(pos, hookapi_record_t, link);
00323     if (hrec->eip == eip) {
00324       list_del(pos);
00325       free(hrec);
00326       break;
00327     }
00328   }
00329   return 0;
00330 }
00331 #endif
00332 
00333 void hookapi_check_call(int in_context)
00334 {
00335   uint32_t eip = *TEMU_cpu_eip;
00336   struct hookapi_record_list_head *head =
00337       &hookapi_record_heads[eip & (HOOKAPI_HTAB_SIZE - 1)];
00338   hookapi_record_t *record, *tmp;
00339 
00340   //NOTE: this is a safe version of LIST_FOREACH
00341   for(record = head->lh_first; record;  record = tmp) { 
00342   tmp = record->link.le_next;
00343 
00344     if(record->eip != eip) 
00345       continue;
00346 
00347     if(record->is_global || 
00348         (in_context && record->esp==0) || // in monitored context
00349         (record->cr3 == TEMU_cpu_cr[3] && 
00350          TEMU_cpu_regs[R_ESP] - record->esp < 80) //function return
00351       ) {
00352       record->fnhook(record->opaque); 
00353     }
00354   }  
00355 }
00356 
00357 void hookapi_hook_function_byname(const char *mod_name, const char *fun_name,
00358                     int is_global, hook_proc_t fnhook, void *opaque, uint32_t sizeof_opaque)
00359 {
00360   uint32_t eip = query_eip(mod_name, fun_name);
00361   if (eip == 0) {
00362     /* <module,function> pair unknown. Add to map containing functions to 
00363        hook when they are loaded by OS */
00364     add_fun_to_hook(mod_name, fun_name, (uintptr_t)fnhook, is_global);
00365     printf("Deferring hooking of %s::%s\n", mod_name, fun_name);
00366   }
00367   else {
00368     printf("Hooking %s::%s @ 0x%x\n", mod_name, fun_name, eip);
00369     hookapi_hook_function(is_global, eip, fnhook, opaque, sizeof_opaque);
00370   }
00371 }
